text:
I test the new Chinese Wan 2.5 vs. OpenAI's Sora 2.

Same prompts. 2 different models.  

Wan 2.5:
☑️ One try and it was good.
☑️ Water, light, and weather feel real.
☑️ Faces look human, even in close-up.
☑️ Camera moves are smooth and cinematic.

Sora 2:
☑️ Understands physics.
☑️ Good light and reflections.
☑️ Already viral videos made by Sora on socials.
☑️ But I tried 10+ times to get some shots right...

Sora 2 gets all the hype, but Wan is just as good and cheaper (Sora = $0.15/video, Wan = $0.10).
